title: Toxicity
body: Can anyone help me on not being toxic? I just got suspended for 14 days and I don't want to get permabanned.I can't control my anger because a yasuo on my team built bork instead of crit and I flamed him for it.If anyone could give me tips on how not to be toxic I would appreciate it thank you.

replies.body: /mute all at the start of every game for a start.
Also you need to remember that there are people behind those pixels on the screen. You arent superior to them. Treat other how you want to be treated. Simple shit man

just quit playing this fucking game. i just got perma banned for being "toxic" and honestly i could give no fucks lol. wanna know why? because i know this game is trash and seeing riot ban paying players for "toxic" behavior just confirms my belief that this game is indeed trash and the company that runs it is trash as well. do yourself a favor and find a new game, league will definitely go to shit if riot keeps this up, it's only a matter of time

1) Don't type when you're upset.
2) Don't spam pings because you aren't typing.
3) Don't intentionally feed.
4) Don't intentionally withdraw your presence from the team fights because you're upset.

You just have to bite the bullet. If people are being toxic to you, take the high road. Ignore and mute them. Just play the game. If it's going poorly, take the game as an opportunity to practice mechanics and practice assessing situations rather than playing to win.

When you have a cooperative team, that anger doesn't come out. Sure you may get frustrated when you make a mistake, but EVERYONE makes mistakes. Even the best pro players die. Even the best pro players miss farm. Even the best pro players get their jungle stolen. 

Also, play with friends and have fun. I have SO much more fun in SR with friends than I do with 4 randoms.

Drop the ego. You're not special. People make mistakes and so do you, so don't berate them when they do. It's just a game. Live by the golden rule. Mute people. Understand you'll always lose around 50% of your games. If people are dumb on your team, keep in mind the enemy will have dumb players on their team and it's just your turn to have em. Its not worth losing your account to basically sound like one of the other millions of assholes who play any game. You arent making any impact by telling people they suck or whatever. But most importantly... remember it's just a video game.
I've heard of people removing their enter key when they're playing too. Seems a bit extreme to me tbh but it's up to you to evaluate how much self control you have.
